events.title: Brunch at Halls Chophouse
events.description: Join us for a delicious brunch at Halls Chophouse starting at 10:00 AM. We will be celebrating Dry January with something bubbly!

events.title: National Championship Tailgate Party
events.description: Join us at HonkyTonk for the National Championship game between Miami Hurricanes and Indiana Hoosiers. Enjoy a special Tailgate Menu, FREE pool & bar games, and the game on the big screen. See you at kickoff!

events.title: Live Music with Flashmob Charleston
events.description: Join us for a night of live music with Flashmob Charleston on the patio from 8-11pm. Come enjoy some groovy tunes this Sunday!

events.title: Wet or Dry January Event
events.description: Join us for a special event featuring cocktails, mocktails, and live DJ sets with Gray Whale Gin, Uncle Arnie's, and Redemption Whiskey.

events.title: Karaoke Night at Vickery's
events.description: Take center stage every Thursday night at Vickery’s with Karaoke hosted by DJ Wild Billsc. Sing your heart out and enjoy a fun night out with friends!

bar.name: Vickery's
bar.address: 1313 Shrimp Boat Ln, Mt Pleasant, SC 29464

events.title: Ultimate Madden Tournament
events.description: Join the biggest Madden Tournament ever at Rebel with 32 players competing for $500 cash prize and the title of Ultimate Madden Champion!

events.title: 2nd Annual Après Ski Oyster Roast
events.description: Join us for the ultimate winter party at our 2nd Annual Après Ski Oyster Roast at New Realm Brewing Co. Enjoy unlimited steamed Privateer Point oysters, complimentary Bloody Mary oyster shooters, winter brews, specialty cocktails, live music, DJ, foam party vibes, mountain raffle, and retro ski costume contest!

bar.name: New Realm Brewing
bar.address: 880 Island Park Drive, Daniel Island, SC 29492

events.title: Fork Cancer 2026
events.description: An unforgettable afternoon benefiting Hope Lodge Charleston, featuring gourmet hors d’oeuvres from 10 top restaurants, craft beers, specialty cocktails, oyster shooters, live music, a live auction, and powerful moments of community and compassion.

events.title: Fork Cancer 2026
events.description: An unforgettable afternoon benefiting Hope Lodge Charleston, featuring gourmet hors d’oeuvres from 10 top restaurants, craft beers, specialty cocktails, oyster shooters, live music, a live auction, and powerful moments of community and compassion.

events.title: Valentine’s Oyster Roast
events.description: Drink beer, eat oysters, and shop at a local vendor market with someone you love at Holy City Brewing on February 7th. Oyster Roast starts at 11am and goes until we run out! Want to go casual? Get a GA ticket and go at your own pace. Want to skip the lines? Got a squad who deserves the royal treatment? Go VIP and get your own private table. Sponsored by Bottles. Vendor Market onsite for Valentine’s gifts! VIP Tables are very limited, with a MAX CAPACITY of 10 per table, and must be purchased prior to February 1st, 2026.

events.title: Super Bowl Watch Party at Republic
events.description: Join the boys from Southern Hospitality for a fun Super Bowl watch party at Republic. Save the date and come hang out for the big game!

events.title: SUPER BOWL SUNDAY Watch Party
events.description: Join us for the ultimate game day watch party with drink specials, FREE oyster roast, shot-skis, game day food specials, and more. Big screens, cold drinks, and a lively crowd.

events.title: Triangle's Sweetheart Vendor Market
events.description: More than 20 local vendors selling goods perfect for that special someone. A portion of the proceeds will benefit My Sister's House. Enjoy live music with Malin Wagnon Trio and food and drink specials all day. No cover charge to enter the event.
